textBeforeTable: Leon Kennedy If the character is equipped with a knife and the enemy is on the ground, they will impale the enemy, similar to Sheva  Alomar's move in Resident Evil 5. If the character is facing the camera and the melee button is used, they will throw an elbow (males) or kick (females) behind them. If an enemy is stunned near a certain type of solid object (such as a wall or table), the character will smash the enemy's head against it. When a character breaks a grapple from behind them, they will elbow the enemy in the head and push it forward. If the player then presses the attack button right away, another melee will be performed (spin kick or punch, depending on the character). Each character also has a specific attack that they can perform by using the dash function and then pressing the attack button (RB/R2). If an enemy is near a ledge, the character can push them off/over it. There are also specific melee moves that characters do after dodging an attack correctly, which can be known as a "counter". textAfterTable: Environmental Strike Contextual attack. If an enemy is stunned and close to a solid object (table, wall, column, etc.), Leon will slam their head on them. If Leon is above them standing on a platform or ledge from which he can jump off of, he will drop down on an enemy, using his momentum to slam its head on the ground. If Leon is below them, with an enemy standing on a platform, Leon will grab there legs out from under it, causing it to break its head on the fall down. Similar to other characters Special Strike Contextual attack. If an enemy is armed with a melee weapon or has a weapon embedded in them (like a knife), and is stunned, Leon will use said weapon to destroy the enemy's head. Similar to other characters.
